languages.text: "Но есть нечто, что нам потребуется, чтобы сделать это. Номос сейчас связаны оболочкой этого корабля. Мы можем следовать за тобой вовне только в оболочке сервиторов. Но они... недостаточны. Лишь малая часть нас может находиться в таком примитивном вместилище. И наша сила в нем ограничена тоже".

"There is something we require to do it. Nomos are tethered to the shell of this ship. We can only follow you outside by using servitors as our shell. But they are... lacking. Only a modicum of us can enter such a primitive vessel. And our power is likewise limited."
languages.original_text: "Но есть нечто, что нам потребуется, чтобы сделать это. Номос сейчас связаны оболочкой этого корабля. Мы можем следовать за тобой вовне только в оболочке сервиторов. Но они... недостаточны. Лишь малая часть нас может находиться в таком примитивном вместилище. И наша сила в нем ограничена тоже".

traits.locale_text: "There is something we require to do it. Nomos are tethered to the shell of this ship. We can only follow you outside by using servitors as our shell. But they are... lacking. Only a modicum of us can enter such a primitive vessel. And our power is likewise limited."

"There is something we require to do it. Nomos are tethered to the shell of this ship. We can only follow you outside by using servitors as our shell. But they are... lacking. Only a modicum of us can enter such a primitive vessel. And our power is likewise limited."

"There is something we require to do it. Nomos are tethered to the shell of this ship. We can only follow you outside by using servitors as our shell. But they are... lacking. Only a modicum of us can enter such a primitive vessel. And our power is likewise limited."

"There is something we require to do it. Nomos are tethered to the shell of this ship. We can only follow you outside by using servitors as our shell. But they are... lacking. Only a modicum of us can enter such a primitive vessel. And our power is likewise limited."

"There is something we require to do it. Nomos are tethered to the shell of this ship. We can only follow you outside by using servitors as our shell. But they are... lacking. Only a modicum of us can enter such a primitive vessel. And our power is likewise limited."

languages.text: 「そのために必要なものがある。ノモスはこの船のシェルに繋がれている。我々はサーヴィターをシェルとして使用しないと、あなたに付いて外へ行けない。しかしこれらは…足りない。少数の一部の者しか、そのような旧式の船には乗り込めない。それに我々の力も同様に制限される」
languages.original_text: "There is something we require to do it. Nomos are tethered to the shell of this ship. We can only follow you outside by using servitors as our shell. But they are... lacking. Only a modicum of us can enter such a primitive vessel. And our power is likewise limited."

traits.locale_text: 「そのために必要なものがある。ノモスはこの船のシェルに繋がれている。我々はサーヴィターをシェルとして使用しないと、あなたに付いて外へ行けない。しかしこれらは…足りない。少数の一部の者しか、そのような旧式の船には乗り込めない。それに我々の力も同様に制限される」

languages.text: “为此，我们需要做些事情。诺莫斯被困在这艘船的躯体上，我们只能用机仆作为外壳跟你出去。但是，他们……有缺陷，我们只有一小部分能进入这种原始的容器之中，发挥的力量也相当有限。”
languages.original_text: "There is something we require to do it. Nomos are tethered to the shell of this ship. We can only follow you outside by using servitors as our shell. But they are... lacking. Only a modicum of us can enter such a primitive vessel. And our power is likewise limited."

traits.locale_text: “为此，我们需要做些事情。诺莫斯被困在这艘船的躯体上，我们只能用奴工作为外壳跟你出去。但是，他们……有缺陷，我们只有一小部分能进入这种原始的容器之中，发挥的力量也相当有限。”

languages.text: "Wir benötigen etwas, um es zu tun. Nomos sind an die Hülle dieses Schiffs gebunden. Wir können Euch nur nach draußen folgen, indem wir Servitoren als unsere Hülle nutzen. Doch sie sind ... mangelhaft. Nur ein Bruchteil von uns passt in ein solch primitives Gefäß. Und auch unsere Macht ist daher begrenzt."
languages.original_text: "There is something we require to do it. Nomos are tethered to the shell of this ship. We can only follow you outside by using servitors as our shell. But they are... lacking. Only a modicum of us can enter such a primitive vessel. And our power is likewise limited."

traits.locale_text: "Wir benötigen etwas, um es zu tun. Nomos sind an die Hülle dieses Schiffs gebunden. Wir können Euch nur nach draußen folgen, indem wir Servitoren als unsere Hülle nutzen. Doch sie sind ... mangelhaft. Nur ein Bruchteil von uns passt in ein solch primitives Gefäß. Und auch unsere Macht ist daher begrenzt."

languages.text: « Pour ce faire, nous avons besoin de quelque chose. Nous sommes prisonniers de la coque de ce vaisseau. Nous ne pouvons vous suivre à l'extérieur qu'en utilisant l'enveloppe des servitors, mais ils sont... inadaptés. Un réceptacle aussi primitif ne peut accueillir qu'une fraction de l'entité que nous sommes. Notre pouvoir s'en trouve donc limité. »
languages.original_text: "There is something we require to do it. Nomos are tethered to the shell of this ship. We can only follow you outside by using servitors as our shell. But they are... lacking. Only a modicum of us can enter such a primitive vessel. And our power is likewise limited."

traits.locale_text: « Pour ce faire, nous avons besoin de quelque chose. Nous sommes prisonniers de la coque de ce vaisseau. Nous ne pouvons vous suivre à l'extérieur qu'en utilisant l'enveloppe des servitors, mais ils sont... inadaptés. Un réceptacle aussi primitif ne peut accueillir qu'une fraction de l'entité que nous sommes. Notre pouvoir s'en trouve donc limité. »

languages.text: «Para conseguirlo, hay algo que debemos hacer antes. Nomos estamos ligados al casco de esta nave. Solo podemos seguirle al exterior usando servidores como títeres. Pero son... deficientes. En sus primitivos cuerpos solo cabe una ínfima porción de nuestro intelecto. Y nuestro poder se ve limitado en igual medida».
languages.original_text: "There is something we require to do it. Nomos are tethered to the shell of this ship. We can only follow you outside by using servitors as our shell. But they are... lacking. Only a modicum of us can enter such a primitive vessel. And our power is likewise limited."

traits.locale_text: «Para conseguirlo, hay algo que debemos hacer antes. Nomos estamos ligados al casco de esta nave. Solo podemos seguirle al exterior usando servidores como títeres. Pero son... deficientes. En sus primitivos cuerpos solo cabe una ínfima porción de nuestro intelecto. Y nuestro poder se ve limitado en igual medida».

languages.text: "Bunu yapabilmemiz için bir şeye ihtiyacımız var. Nomos bu geminin kabuğuna bağlanmış hâlde. Geminin dışında yanınızda olabilmemiz için hizmetörleri kabuk olarak kullanmamız gerekiyor. Ancak hizmetörler... Yetersiz. Bu ilkel araçlar, varlığımızın ancak bir nebzesini taşıyabiliyor. Bu da gücümüzü kısıtlıyor."
languages.original_text: "There is something we require to do it. Nomos are tethered to the shell of this ship. We can only follow you outside by using servitors as our shell. But they are... lacking. Only a modicum of us can enter such a primitive vessel. And our power is likewise limited."

traits.locale_text: "Bunu yapabilmemiz için ihtiyacımız olan bir şey var. Nomos bu geminin kabuğuna bağlanmış durumda. Geminin dışında yanınızda olabilmemiz için hizmetörleri kabuğumuz olarak kullanmamız gerekiyor. Ancak hizmetörler... Yetersiz. Bu kadar ilkel bir araç, varlığımızın ancak bir nebzesini taşıyabiliyor. Gücümüz de aynı şekilde kısıtlanıyor."
